welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Gross-Umstadt, a charming town known for its picturesque streets, local wine, and friendly atmosphere. We hope you have a wonderful time exploring and experiencing all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Frankfurt-Egelsbach Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Frankfurt-Egelsbach Airport, catering to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Frankfurt International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The secondary terminal of Frankfurt International Airport, primarily serving international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest terminal of Frankfurt International Airport, dedicated to Lufthansa and its partner airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, with a daily time limit of 4 hours.
